option.value:
package com.sameerasw.nextbus.data
import androidx.room.Embedded import androidx.room.Entity import androidx.room.PrimaryKey
@Entity(tableName = "bus_schedule") data class BusScheduleEntity( @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true) val id: Long = 0, val timestamp: Long, // epoch millis val route: String, val place: String, val seating: String?, // "Available", "Almost full", "Full", "Loaded" val locationLat: Double?, val locationLng: Double?, val locationAddress: String?, @Embedded(prefix = "bus_") val bus: BusEmbedded? )
data class BusEmbedded( val type: String? = null, val tier: String? = null, val rating: Double? = null )
